name: Snake Adventure
description:
Theme: Growth

Controls 

A - Move Left

D - Move Right

L-Shift- Sprint (Only available in Level 3)

Escape - Pauses the game

Introduction

You play as a snake that needs to grow longer to clear gaps and overcome obstacles. Your goal is to progress through the levels, avoid obstacles and make it through safe.

Background

This game was created in 14 days as part of the "My First Game Jam" game jam. The theme was growth so instantly I thought of the classic game Snake. I wanted to limit the programming so I could make a small and more polished game without getting stuck. I then came up with the concept of doing a platformer game where you have to grow as a snake to overcome gaps. Limiting myself to a simple concept gave me more time to spend on the art and level design.
